name: Space Miner: Escape
description:
Space Miner: Escape

Pilot a spaceship through and out an asteroid in space. 

With many challenging levels and power-ups to help you along the way.

Avoid dangerous obstacles as even the slightest mistake could cause you to go boom!

Controls:

Boost                  : Space bar
Rotate left       : A
Rotate Right  : D
Minimise          : E
Orbital Light  : Q

Installation

Open your Spaceminerescape.zip file and drag the Spaceminer folder to somewhere on your computer. Now open your new Spaceminer folder and start the game.

How to play

The object of the game is to collect three blue crystals in each level in order to activate the teleporter to the next.
